PyParticleSystem Class Reference

This class is the abstract picture of the particles that is invariant to a renderer. More...

#include <py_particle_system.hpp>

class  ThisAttributeMap
 internal More...

Detailed Description

This class is the abstract picture of the particles that is invariant to a renderer.

PyObject * PyParticleSystem::py_action ( PyObject *  args  ) 

This Python method allows the script to access an action from the particle system.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. This should be an index to the type of Action.
Returns:
A reference to the Action if found or None if none of that type of action belongs in the particle system.

PyObject * PyParticleSystem::py_addAction ( PyObject *  args  ) 

This Python method allows the script to add an action to the particle system.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. This should be a reference to an instance of ParticleSystemAction.

PyObject * PyParticleSystem::py_clear ( PyObject *  args  ) 

This Python method allows the script to tell the particle system to remove all particles from itself.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. None are expected or checked.

PyObject * PyParticleSystem::py_force ( PyObject *  args  ) 

Python-accessible wrapper for the spawn method.

PyObject * PyParticleSystem::py_load ( PyObject *  args  ) 

Python-accessible load method.

PyObject * PyParticleSystem::py_removeAction ( PyObject *  args  ) 

This Python method allows the script to remove an action from the particle system.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. This could either be an index to the type of Action to be removed or a reference to an instance of ParticleSystemAction.
